timezone.description: Timezone as a TZ identifier, set when using the time logging timer function

avatar.description: URL of an image file representing the account as an avatar

account_type.description: High level permissions of the account; `1` = Account Owner, `2` = Admin, `4` = Member, `5` = Billing, `7` = Manager

access.description: Used in conjunction with `account_type` to determine granular permissions, see response description

department_filter_id.description: The department ID if this account is filtered by a department

view_rights.description: (**Deprecated** - see `access`) Do they have rights to view the team? `1` = Yes, `0` = No

edit_rights.description: (**Deprecated** - see `access`) If a Member, do they have rights to edit their schedule? `1` = Yes, `0` = No

active.description: Is this account active? `1` = Yes, `0` = No

created.description: Date time this record was created

modified.description: Date time this record was last modified
